content.description:
The tallest, proudest wall in KLO Creek. Developers have put in a tremendous amount of work bolting and cleaning lines. Unfortunately, the rock here seems to weep sand, especially after rain- brush holds off when you can! 
  
 Many climbs feature a vertical face section on top quality rock for the first major portion of the climb, followed by a boulder problem to turn a bulge or roof section. Open hand climbing above, with some climbs featuring heart breaking cruxes 35+ meters off the deck!
